Package org.princehouse.mica.example

Class Summary
DemoCompositeProtocol This is a merged four-protocol, self-stabilizing stack that sits on top of an arbitrary overlay, "view" The main method demonstrates running an experiment with this protocol using the TestHarness class to create many simulated nodes on a random graph Layer 1: Leader election.
DemoNaiveBroadcast This is a merged four-protocol, self-stabilizing stack that sits on top of an arbitrary overlay, "view" The main method demonstrates running an experiment with this protocol using the TestHarness class to create many simulated nodes on a random graph Layer 1: Leader election.
DemoNaiveBroadcast.StringBroadcast  
FindMinPull Pull-based "find minimum value" example protocol
FindMinPush "Find minimum value" pull protocol example
FindMinSymmetric Push-pull "find minimum value" example
TreeCountNodes Count the nodes in each subtree of a rooted spanning tree.
TreeLabelNodes Use the subtree node count protocol to assign unique numbers to every node in DFS order.
